pkgmetadata.longdescription: Vector Binary Tree to Make Your Data Management More Efficient // Provides a new data structure, vector binary tree, to make your data visiting and management more efficient. if your data has very structurized column names with specific connecting pattern, it can read, split, and factorize these names, then build the mapping from all string objects to an array or tensor, through vector binary tree, by which the batched data processing can be implemented easily. The methods of array and tensor are also applicable.
